instruction: Create an annotated git tag named 'v1.0.0' with the message 'First stable release' on the current commit in the repository at /home/user/project.

command: mkdir -p /home/user/project && cd /home/user/project && git init && echo 'print(1)' > app.py && git add . && git commit -m 'Release ready'
import pyautogui; import time; pyautogui.hotkey('ctrl', 'alt', 't'); time.sleep(1)

result.command: cd /home/user/project && git tag -l 2>/dev/null && git tag -n1 v1.0.0 2>/dev/null
